EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-06-22-IT Maturity Survey EMEA Send Commercial.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Last Chance|£25 Amazon Gift Card for a 5 Minute Survey|IT Maturity Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/Q9B357V?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_p4n3k5ua1s=[marketo_p4n3k5ua1s_value]&marketo_9j0x2okrpc=[marketo_9j0x2okrpc_value]&marketo_xlrnftr1zk=[marketo_xlrnftr1zk_value]]]> {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We are aware that you get hundreds of emails each week from vendors, which is why we wanted to take a moment to let you know we understand your time is extremely valuable and extend an offer to partner with you to support a cause that is close to you. We recently launched our IT Maturity Survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/Q9B357V?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_p4n3k5ua1s=[marketo_p4n3k5ua1s_value]&marketo_9j0x2okrpc=[marketo_9j0x2okrpc_value]&marketo_xlrnftr1zk=[marketo_xlrnftr1zk_value]]]>, to better understand the challenges faced in achieving your IT goals, and are offering a £25 Amazon gift card for completing the 5 minute survey by June 22nd. We are also offering £100 donation to a registered charity of your choice for agreeing to and completing a 30 minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer (meeting must occur within 10 days of survey submission). If at the end of the meeting, you choose to engage in a proof of value, we will donate £1,000 to the registered charity of your choosing. We look forward to the opportunity to speak with you about the benefits Turbonomic can bring to your infrastructure! <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/Q9B357V?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_p4n3k5ua1s=[marketo_p4n3k5ua1s_value]&marketo_9j0x2okrpc=[marketo_9j0x2okrpc_value]&marketo_xlrnftr1zk=[marketo_xlrnftr1zk_value]]]> - The Turbonomic Team
